translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Book of Conditional Relations in Reverse Order

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.53. Sanidassanattika, Micchattaniyatattika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyato
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika micchat taniya tattika  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na micchatta niyatam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sammatta niyatam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ sammatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ aniyataḥ
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations in Brief

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
